info.title: NOS+ API
info.description: Comprehensive API for Nosana (NOS) token data including prices, volume, holders, and staking information.

chart.description: Time-series price data including OHLC candles, summary metrics, and metadata.

widget.description: Latest spot price, range metrics, and sparkline data for UI widgets.

stats.description: Aggregated price statistics, distribution metrics, and technical trend indicators.

table.description: Paginated price rows with change calculations and formatted display helpers.

index.description: Lists all price endpoints with their paths and supported parameters.

chart.description: Time-series trading volume with aggregates, summaries, and metadata.

widget.description: Current volume snapshot with range statistics and rankings.

stats.description: Detailed trading volume statistics, distributions, patterns, and trend insights.

table.description: Paginated trading volume rows with formatted output helpers.

index.description: Lists all volume endpoints with their paths and supported parameters.

responses.unauthorized: Authentication required to call this endpoint.
responses.rateLimited: Request rate exceeded. Retry after the cooldown.

index.description: Lists all holder analytics endpoints with their paths and supported parameters.

chart.description: Time-series holder counts with summary metrics and metadata.

widget.description: Current holder snapshot with change ranges, growth metrics, and milestones.

stats.description: Aggregated holder statistics, distribution metrics, projections, and growth insights.

table.description: Paginated holder rows with formatted display helpers.

trace.description: Start a background trace to follow NOS token movements across wallets.
trace.response: Trace job metadata and graph payload.

cache.description: Return a previously computed trace result by cache key without recomputing.
cache.response: Cached trace payload or cache miss indication.

job.description: Check the processing status of a trace job using its key.

index.description: Lists all sentiment endpoints with their paths and supported parameters.

chart.description: Time-series Fear & Greed index with sentiment zones, optional moving averages, and component breakdowns.
chart.response: Chart payload containing data points and summary metadata.

table.description: Paginated Fear & Greed index rows with sentiment labels, changes, and distribution summary.
table.response: Table payload with rows, pagination, and summary insights.

widget.description: Current sentiment snapshot with gauge configuration, trend comparisons, and contextual insights.
widget.response: Widget payload for dashboards and stat cards.

stats.description: Comprehensive analytics including historical ranges, distributions, patterns, and data quality metrics.

index.description: Lists all forecast endpoints with their paths and supported parameters.

chart.description: Historical prices blended with projected values and confidence bands for forward-looking analysis.
chart.response: Chart payload including accuracy metadata and forecast intervals.

table.description: Tabular forecast breakdown with price targets, confidence, and probability helpers.
table.response: Table payload with rows, summary statistics, and column descriptors.

widget.description: Condensed forecast snapshot featuring current price, horizon targets, model accuracy, and signals.
widget.response: Widget payload for dashboards and alert surfaces.

stats.description: Comprehensive forecast analytics covering accuracy, technical indicators, and historical performance.
